title: Human reproduction. - [2nd. ed.]
brief_description: A very clear exposition of human reproduction mainly by the use of animated diagrams showing the male and female reproductive organs, the menstrual cycle, fertilisation and growth of a fetus over the nine months of pregnancy.
description: A very clear exposition of human reproduction mainly by the use of animated diagrams showing the male and female reproductive organs, the menstrual cycle, fertilisation and growth of a fetus over the nine months of pregnancy.
